thread.title: Uppu Karuvadu trailer

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Uppu Karuvadu trailer
text:
The trailer of Uppu Karuvadu starring Nandhita, Karunakaran, Sathish, directed by Radha Mohan has been released. The rest of the star cast comprises MS Baskar, Mayilsamy, Kumaravel, Chams, Narayanan, debutante Rakshitha, Saravanan and Doubt Senthil. The film is laugh riot and the music has been scored by Guitarist Steve Vatz Madhan Karky has penned the lyrics. Uppu Karuvadu has been shot in coastal regions and the film has captured the lifestyle of the people living in the coasts.
Check out the trailer:
